en.name: King’s Squire
en.passiveDescription: Obtain the Teachings of the Forest effect when unleashing Elemental Skills and Bursts, increasing Elemental Mastery by {{60//80//100//120//140}} for 12s. This effect will be removed when switching characters. When the Teachings of the Forest effect ends or is removed, it will deal {{100//120//140//160//180%}} of ATK as DMG to 1 nearby opponent. The Teachings of the Forest effect can be triggered once every 20s.

zh.name: 王下近侍
zh.passiveDescription: 施放元素战技或元素爆发时，将获得「森林教诲」的效果，元素精通提升{{60//80//100//120//140}}点，持续12秒。该效果将在切换角色时移除。森林教诲的持续时间结束或被移除时，将对附近一名敌人造成{{100//120//140//160//180%}}攻击力的伤害。森林教诲每20秒至多触发一次。
